description:
Beauty truly is in the eye of the beholder! From elves to succubi to cyclopes and more, the Yoruno Gloss reviewers are here to rate the red-light delights of all manner of monster girls...The only thing is, they can never agree on which species are the hottest!

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: 异种族风俗娘评鉴指南

tags.name: Prostitution
tags.description: Features characters who are paid for sexual favors.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Ahegao
tags.description: Features a character making an exaggerated orgasm face.

tags.name: Hypersexuality
tags.description: Portrays a character with a hypersexuality disorder, compulsive sexual behavior, or sex addiction.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Boobjob
tags.description: Features the stimulation of male genitalia by breasts.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Facial
tags.description: Features sexual ejaculation onto an individual's face.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Lactation
tags.description: Features breast milk play and production.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Cunnilingus
tags.description: Features oral sex performed on female genitalia.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Bondage
tags.description: Features BDSM, with or without the use of accessories.

tags.name: Irrumatio
tags.description: Oral rape; features a character thrusting their genitalia or a phallic object into the mouth of another character.

tags.name: Futanari
tags.description: Features female characters with male genitalia.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Alchemy
tags.description: Features character(s) who practice alchemy.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Tentacles
tags.description: Features the long appendages most commonly associated with octopuses or squid, often sexually penetrating a character.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Feet
tags.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's feet.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Femdom
tags.description: Female Dominance. Features sexual acts with a woman in a dominant position.

tags.name: Centaur
tags.description: Prominently features a character with a human upper body and the lower body of a horse.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Skeleton
tags.description: Prominently features skeleton(s) as a character.

tags.name: Exhibitionism
tags.description: Features the act of exposing oneself in public for sexual pleasure.

tags.name: Group Sex
tags.description: Features more than two participants engaged in sex simultaneously.

node.description:
**Doujin Circle:** AstroQube

[Website (AstroQube)](http://www.astroqube.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masha_aq) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=28296)

[Blog](http://amahara22.blog86.fc2.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/amaharateikoku) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=12304)

__Gender:__ Male
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuyu_yuyuo) | [Tumblr](https://yuyuoto.tumblr.com/)

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/ozone_maru) | [Pixiv (NSFW)](https://www.pixiv.net/users/15639)

Publishes explicit doujinshi under the name "Marumiya."

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/231414719)

Originating from [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/)'s photography department.
Takahiro Majima is a Japanese director, episode director and storyboard artist.

__Residence:__ Tokyo, Japan

[Blog](https://hh22.hatenablog.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/dne_bu_hh) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/ひらさわひさよし)

Hisayoshi is a sound director and animation producer, and also the chairman of the animation studios [Creators in Pack](https://anilist.co/studio/6072) and [Passione](https://anilist.co/studio/911/Passione).
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/111865880)

__Height:__ 164 cm
__Hobbies:__ darts, driving, games, karaoke
__Skills & Abilities:__ acrobatics, karate, singing

[Profile (YU-RIN Pro)](https://yu-rin.com/pro-man/kobayashi-yusuke) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yusuke032510)

On January 1st, 2025, it was announced that he had gotten married to voice actress [Yumi Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/106784/Yumi-Uchiyama).

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~! - Arslan in "Arslan Senki x Musou" (VG) (Japanese)
- Itaku in "Utawarerumono: Futari no Hakuoro" (VG) (Japanese)
- Opoona in "Warriors All-Stars" (VG) (Japanese)
- Ranmaru Mori in "Sengoku Night Blood" (VG) (Japanese)
- Sigurd in "Guardian's Violation" (VG) (Japanese)
- Takeru Akabane in "Code of Joker Edge" (arcade game) (Japanese)
- Terumi Niida; Kaoru Shishibara in "Prince of Stride" (VG) (Japanese)
- Tokugawa Ieyasu in "Hana Oboro ~Sengoku Den Ranki~" (VG) (Japanese)
- Tōshirō Shinano in "Touken Ranbu -ONLINE-" (VG) (Japanese) 
- Byleth in "Fire Emblem Three Houses-" (VG) (Japanese)
- Kalpas in "Honkai Impact 3rd" (VG) (Japanese)
- Xavier in "Love and Deepspace" (VG) (Japanese)!~

__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/maji_opai) | [Blog](http://majipro.blog22.fc2.com/)

[Profile](http://artist.amuse.co.jp/artist/tomita_miyu/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/miyu-tomita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyju_tomita) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tomita__miyu._/)

The Grand Prix winner of the 2014 Seiyuu Artist Training Program Selection competition, which was sponsored by Amuse and Ken Production. After being scouted by six talent agencies, she eventually joined Amuse.

She made her voice acting debut in 2015, voicing a number of unnamed characters in Himouto Umaru-chan.

Non-Anime Roles
• Layla - Genshin Impact (VG)
• Zara - Memento Mori (VG)
• New Jersey - Azur Lane (VG)
• Jiu Niangzi - Reverse: 1999 (VG)

[Twitter (NSFW)](https://twitter.com/typhtn) | [Pixiv (NSFW)](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/71370)

He retired from being a full-time animator in 2016, but does still animate on rare occasions.

Currently working as an 18+ artist under the name Typehatena (たいぷはてな).
